page.title: 11ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: In Chedworth we have lots of special arts and crafts.The most unusual is {screen printing.}My mum and dad make smocks.They make them like this.First they draw pictures of the smocks,then they print the front and back then wash the screen and sew the smocks up .Then they sell them at the Corn Hall or Covent Garden.We have a{potter}in the village.He gets his clay from the rivers he says it does not dry so quickly and is easy to work with.He makes plates,bowls,jugs,cups and saucers then he sells them at markets.His wife is an{author.}She writes paper back books for little children.Her latest book is a hard back book for adults about herb gardens.Her books are normaly about family disasters when doing something. One lady takes a few school children{spinning}in the afternoon.
